1.Data Collection Usage
 This Application collects user information, including device type, location, IP address, and usage behavior, as specified in our Privacy Policy. These data points help provide a personalized and efficient user experience, enabling features such as location-based recommendations. 

 Location Services:
Purpose: Location data helps tailor app features based on approximate geographical location. Data Privacy: All location information shared with third-party services is aggregated and anonymized to protect user privacy. Third-Party Data Handling:

The Application may share anonymized data with trusted third-party services, as outlined in the Privacy Policy, to improve app functionality. Please review the Privacy Policies of our third-party providers, such as Google Play Services, for further details on data handling.

 User Responsibilities:

Acceptable Use: Users must use the Application for entertainment purposes only and refrain from any activities that could harm the Application's integrity. Opt-Out Options: To halt all data collection, users can uninstall the Application via standard device processes.

 Safety Measures:

The Service Provider implements security protocols to protect user information. Users are encouraged to keep the app updated to benefit from ongoing security enhancements.

 Age Requirement:

The Application is not intended for children under the age of 13. Parents or guardians aware of any underage use are encouraged to reach out for prompt data deletion.

 Updates and Changes:

Our Privacy Policy and User Guide may be updated periodically. Continued use of the Application signifies consent to these changes.

 For further assistance or to report any issues, please contact us at ranaislam97936@gmail.com
